participant_1.name: Jordan
participant_1.personality: Enthusiastic and outgoing, enjoys sports and outdoor activities.
participant_1.background: I am a georgia resident. My favorite fiction genres are sci fi and horror. I like nfl and college football. I play in a nfl fantasy football league.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Creative and nurturing, loves the arts and values family bonds.
participant_2.background: I dance ballet. I am an only child. My mother was a sunday school teacher. I went to an all girls christian high school. I am currently in nursing school.

content.text: Me too! Where are you from?
Cool! What do you like to do in Savannah?
I like to go to the beach, dance ballet, and spend time with my friends.
That sounds fun! I like to go to the beach too. What kind of ballet do you dance?
I dance classical ballet. I've been dancing since I was a little girl.
That's awesome! I've always wanted to learn how to dance ballet.
You should! It's a lot of fun.
Maybe I will! What else do you like to do?
I also like to read, watch movies, and spend time with my family.
Me too! I love to read sci fi and horror books. What kind of movies do you like to watch?
I like to watch all kinds of movies, but I especially like romantic comedies and action movies.
Me too! I love romantic comedies and action movies too.
Cool! We should watch a movie together sometime.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I'd love to.
Great! We can exchange numbers and talk about it later.
